fields.name: Riskit jotka edellyttävät muutoksia hallittuihin resursseihin
Poikkeamat jotka eivät vaadi muutoksia hallittuihin resursseihin
Poikkeamat, jotka vaativat muutoksia hallittuihin resursseihin
Arvioi & sulje
fields.description: Arvioi pyyntö, viimeistele kirjaukset, lähetä submit improvement proposals, and close the call administratively.

fields.name: Käy läpi toimitus & palaute
fields.description: Varmista, että toipuminen on valmis. Varmista asia palvelupyynnön tekijältä. Ilmoita kaikki linkitetyt ali-tapahtumat myös valmistuneiksi.

fields.name: Palvelun määrittely
fields.description: Muunna funktinaalinen suunnitelma tekniseksi suunnitelmaksi jotta toive voidaan toteuttaa.

fields.name: Suorita toiminnot
fields.description: Käsittele palvelupyyntö kuten on pyydetty.

fields.name: Valmistele palautuminen
fields.description: Valmistele ratkaisu jolla voidaan palautua virheestä. Lähetä muutos- tai palvelupyyntö.

fields.name: Valmistele tarjous
fields.description: Laadi tarjous toiveen toteuttamiseksi.

fields.name: Luokittele
fields.description: Kategorisoi ja priorisoi riski.

fields.name: Käy läpi toimitus ja palaute
fields.description: Tarkista, onko palautuminen saatu päätökseen. Tarkista tämä pyynnön lähettäjältä. Tarkista, että myös kaikki alitapaukset on myös merkitty valmiiksi.

fields.name: Arvioi & sulje
fields.description: Arvioi palvelupyyntö. Viimeistele hallinnolliset tehtävät. Lähetä parannusehdotukset. Sulje pyyntö hallinnollisesti.

fields.name: Arvioi & sulje
fields.description: Arvioi palvelupyyntö. Viimeistele hallinnolliset tehtävät. Lähetä parannusehdotukset. Sulje pyyntö hallinnollisesti.

fields.name: Luokittele
fields.description: Kategorisoi ja priorisoi the RFC.

fields.name: Arvioi & sulje
fields.description: Arvioi palvelupyyntö. Viimeistele hallinnolliset tehtävät. Lähetä parannusehdotukset. Sulje pyyntö hallinnollisesti.

fields.name: Hyväksy poikkeama
fields.description: Kirjaa poikkeama. Linkitä se liittyvään palveluun ja infrastruktuuriin, ja mahdollisesti muihin auki oleviin poikkeamiin. Varmista pyynnön tekijän valtuutukset.

fields.name: Arvioi & sulje
fields.description: Arvioi palvelupyyntö. Viimeistele hallinnolliset tehtävät. Lähetä parannusehdotukset. Sulje pyyntö hallinnollisesti.

fields.name: Käy läpi toimitus & palaute
fields.description: Tarkista että toive on toteutettu. Varmista se pyynnön lähettäjältä. Sulje myös linkitetyt toiveet.

fields.name: Selvitä syy
fields.description: Riskin syy on selvitettävä ennen riskin mitigoimista tai vauhdittamista.

fields.name: Käyttöönotto
fields.description: Lähetä palvelupyyntö käyttöönottoa varten. Palvelupyynnöllä viedään muokatut komponentit tuotantoon käyttöönottosuunnitelman mukaisesti. Keskustele tarjouksesta ja muokkaa sitä kunnes osapuolet hyväksyvät sen.

fields.name: Arvioi & sulje
fields.description: Arvioi palvelupyyntö. Viimeistele hallinnolliset tehtävät. Lähetä parannusehdotukset. Sulje pyyntö hallinnollisesti.

fields.name: Arvioi & sulje
fields.description: Arvioi palvelupyyntö. Viimeistele hallinnolliset tehtävät. Lähetä parannusehdotukset. Sulje pyyntö hallinnollisesti.

fields.name: Arvioi & sulje
fields.description: Arvioi palvelupyyntö. Viimeistele hallinnolliset tehtävät. Lähetä parannusehdotukset. Sulje pyyntö hallinnollisesti.

fields.name: Testaa & julkaise
fields.description: Aja testit aikataulun mukaan. Tallenna tulokset testiraportille. Huolehdi että valmisteltu muutos on hyväksyttävissä tuotantoon.

fields.name: Ota vastaan palvelupyyntö
fields.description: Rekisteröi palvelupyyntö. Linkitä se siihen liittyvään palveluun ja infrastruktuuriin, sekä muihin avoimina oleviin palvelupyyntöihin. Varmista pyynnön tekijän valtuudet.

fields.name: Päivitä konfiguraationhallintatietokanta
fields.description: Tarkista, että toive on toteutunut. Varmista se toiveen lähettäjältä. Sulje myös linkitetyt toiveet.

fields.name: Käy läpi toimitus & palaute
fields.description: Varmista että riski on mitigoitu. Tarkista tämä riskin lähettäjältä. Sulje myös linkitetyt riskit.

fields.name: Suunnittele toiminnot
fields.description: Suunnittele toiminnot kalenteriin, jossa on kaikki operatiiviset toiminnot.

fields.name: Luokittele
fields.description: Kategorisoi ja priorisoi poikkeama.

fields.name: Luokittele
fields.description: Kategorisoi ja priorisoi riski.

fields.name: Ota toimenpiteet käyttöön
fields.description: Toimenpiteestä riippuen, käsittely jatkuu joko muutoksilla sopimuksiin, muutoksilla hallittuihin resursseihin, tai operoinnill.a

fields.name: Käy läpi toimitus & palaute
fields.description: Varmista, että riski on mitigoitu. Varmista tämä riskin lähettäjältä. Sulje myös kaikki auki olevat, liittyvät riskit.

fields.name: Analysoi
fields.description: Selvitä, miten virheen seuraukset voidaan korjata. Etsi aiemmin käytetty ratkaisu tai pyydä ratkaisutiimiä etsimään ratkaisua.

fields.name: Tunnista riskit
fields.description: Rekisteröi riski. Linkitä se siihen liittyvään palveluun ja infrastruktuuriin, sekä muihin mahdollisesti auki oleviin liittyviin riskeihin.

fields.name: Toteutus
fields.description: Lähetä palvelupyyntö sovitun palvelun toteuttamiseksi.

fields.name: Valmistele toipuminen
fields.description: Valmistele ratkaisu poikkeamasta toipumiseksi. Lähetä palvelu- tai muutospyyntö.

fields.name: Hyväksy muutospyyntö
fields.description: Rekisteröi muutospyyntö, ja linkitä se liittyvään palveluun ja infrastruktuuriin. Linkitä muutospyyntö siihen liittyviin, auki oleviin palvelupyyntöihin. Varmista pyynnön tekijän valtuutukset.

fields.name: Käy läpi toimitus & palaute
fields.description: Tarkista, onko palvelupyyntö toteutunut. Varmista tämä palvelupyynnön lähettäjältä. Sulje myös auki olevat liittyvät palvelupyynnöt.

fields.name: Recover
fields.description: Korjaa poikkeama muutos- tai palvelupyynnön avulla.

fields.name: Ota toimenpide käyttöön
fields.description: Riipuen toimenpiteestä, prosessointi jatkuu joko muutoksilla sopimuksiin, muutoksilla hallittuihin resursseihin, tai operoinnilla.

fields.name: Luokittele
fields.description: Kategorisoi ja priorisoi poikkeama.

fields.name: Select measure
fields.description: In the event of a threat: identify possible measures to reduce the effect of the risk, once the cause has been identified. Limiting that effect is called mitigating. In case of an opportunity, look for possibilities to foster (stimulate) the intended effect.

fields.name: Käy läpi toimitus Review delivery & feedback palaute
fields.description: Check whether the requested change has been delivered, and verify this with the requester. Also, notify any linked RFCs ready.

fields.name: Determine cause
fields.description: To mitigate or foster a risk, the cause must first be determined.

fields.name: Prepare change
fields.description: Draw up a roadmap, prepare the change to the production environment, and draw up a test plan and a deployment plan.

fields.name: Identifying risks
fields.description: Register the risk. Link this to the service and infrastructure to which the risk relates, and possibly to other risks that are still handled.

fields.name: Käy läpi toimitus Review delivery & feedback palaute
fields.description: Varmista, että riski on mitigoitu. Varmista tämä pyynnön lähettäjältä. Merkitse myös liittyvät riskit valmiiksi.

fields.name: Valitse toimenpide
fields.description: Jos kyseessä on uhka, kun syy on tunnistettu, tunnista mahdolliset toimenpiteet joilla riskin vaikutuksia voidaan pienentää. Riskin vaikutuksien pienentämistä kutsutaan mitigoinniksi. Jos kyseessä on mahdollisuus, tunnista mahdollisuudet joilla voidaan kasvattaa toivottua vaikutusta.

fields.name: Luokittele
fields.description: Kategorisoi ja priorisoi the wish.

fields.name: Deploy measure
fields.description: Depending on the selected measure, processing continues with workflow changes to agreements, changes to managed infrastructure, or operate

fields.name: Luokittele
fields.description: Kategorisoi ja priorisoi the risk.

fields.name: Select measure
fields.description: In the event of a threat: identify possible measures to reduce the effect of the risk, once the cause has been identified. Limiting that effect is called mitigating. In case of an opportunity, look for possibilities to foster (stimulate) the intended effect.

fields.name: Plan & agree
fields.description: Determine the people involved, draft a plan, and agree it with the people involved, according to the type of change granted. If possible, follow a release-based approach, by bundling the handling of related changes. Plan the steps of the changes on the change calendar.

fields.name: Negotiate
fields.description: Discuss the quotation and adjust it until the agreement has been reached.

fields.name: Analyze
fields.description: Determine how the effect of the failure can be remedied. Find a previously used solution (matching) or have a solution team search for the solution.

fields.name: Recover
fields.description: Fix the failure via an RFC or a service request.

fields.name: Accept incident
fields.description: Log the incident. Link it to the service and infrastructure to which the call relates, and possibly to other incidents that are still handled. Verify the requester's authorization.

fields.name: Determine cause
fields.description: To mitigate or foster a risk, the cause must first be determined.

fields.name: Luokittele
fields.description: Kategorisoi ja priorisoi palvelupyyntö.

fields.name: Accept wishes
fields.description: Log the wish, and link it to the service to which the wish relates, and possibly to other wishes that are still being handled. Verify the requester's authorization.

fields.name: Identifying risks
fields.description: Register the $risk$. Link this to the service and infrastructure to which the risk relates, and possibly to other risks that are still handled.

fields.name: Close the wish administratively
fields.description: Set the status of the $wish$ call to 'closed'.

fields.name: Evaluate the incident
fields.description:
The $coordinator$s and $operator$s involved evaluate the handling of the $incident$ in various respects:
•	Has the $incident$ call been executed properly?
* Is everything recorded that is important for good reporting?
* Does the handling provide any learning points?
* Is the call a potential standard for the handling of a next call?
•	Is an improvement action needed outside the process?

fields.name: Verify that the $risk$ has been handled
fields.description:
Check whether the $deployment$ actually delivered what was requested.
Check linked $call$s as well.

fields.name: Verify the $change$ $deployment$ with the requester
fields.description:
Verify that the person who submitted the $change$ agrees with the result, according to the $service agreement$.
Check linked $call$s as well.
In $workflow$ 2, set the status of the call to $workflow$ 'fulfilled'.
In workflows 1, 3, 6, and 7, set the status to 'process fulfilled'.

fields.name: Build the change
fields.description:
Create the planned $facilities$ as agreed in the $change$ plan.
Develop, assemble, and/or purchase the planned $facilities$.

fields.name: Draw up a $change plan$
fields.description:
Draw up a high-level $change plan$, based on an impact analysis and on the existing [change calendar]. If possible, follow a release-based approach, by bundling the handling of related changes.
Adopt previous workflow details.

fields.name: Prioritize the incident
fields.description: First, determine the impact according to the $impact table$. Then, determine the urgency according to the $urgency table$. Assign the resulting priority according to the $priority value table$.

fields.name: Close the change administratively
fields.description: Set the status of the $change$ $call$ to 'closed'.

fields.name: Receive, verify, and register the risk
fields.description:
Verify that the requester is authorized to submit the $service request$.
Determine a unique tracking number for the $service request$.
Provide the requester with the tracking number for later communication.
Don't wait for risks to be reported, but actively look for $threat$s in vulnerable service sectors, and for $improvement$s in promising sectors.

fields.name: Register the changed service and infrastructure components in the MIR
fields.description: Register the changed $service$ and $infrastructure component$s in the $MIR$

fields.name: Evaluate the risk call
fields.description:
The $coordinator$s and $operator$s involved evaluate the handling of the $risk$ in various respects:
•	Has the call been executed properly?
* Is everything recorded that is important for good reporting?
* Does the handling provide any learning points?
* Is the call a potential standard for the handling of a next call?
•	Is an improvement action needed outside the process?

fields.name: Discuss the wish in the context of existing services
fields.description:
Check the $wish$ for completeness and discuss the $wish$ with the requester to be completely clear about the nature of the call.
Request additional or missing data.
Specify the wish in a $functional design$, in terms of $facility$ and $support$, and in terms of $functionality$ and $functioning$.

fields.name: Select the measure
fields.description:
Select the measure with the best $business case$.
Prepare the required $workflow$: create a $Wish$, a $Request for Change$, or a $Service Request$ for the $deployment$ of the selected measure.

fields.name: Create business cases for the measures
fields.description: Compare the measures, the associated results, the chances of that result and the costs, and the feasibility, and create a $business case$ for each measure.

fields.name: Execute the activities of palvelupyyntö as requested
fields.description:
Each solution team or operator handles the activities as planned in the static and dynamic sections of the $OPS calendar$.
During monitoring, log all relevant events.
If an event shows a failure or an imminent failure during monitoring, submit an incident and record that incident in the $OPS logs$.
If a $risk$ is perceived during monitoring, the $operator$ submits the $risk$ and records it in the $OPS logs$.

fields.name: Verify the incident recovery with the requester
fields.description:
Verify that the person who submitted the incident agrees with the result, according to the $Service Agreement$.
Check linked $call$s as well.
In all workflows (3 and 4), set the status of the call to 'workflow fulfilled'.

fields.name: Discuss the incident in the context of existing services
fields.description:
Check the incident for completeness and discuss the incident with the $requester$ to be completely clear about the nature of the call.
Request additional or missing data.

fields.name: Submit improvement proposals for the risk handling
fields.description:
Submit a $risk$ for each $improvement$ that resulted from the evaluation.
Register the $risk$ in the $risk call log$.

fields.name: Complete the registration of palvelupyyntö call
fields.description: Complete the registration of the $service request$ $call$

fields.name: Link the risk
fields.description:
Link the $risk$ to the $service$ and to the $infrastructure$ it relates to.
Link the $risk$ to previously submitted $risks$.

fields.name: Receive, verify, and register the risk
fields.description:
Verify that the $requester$ is authorized to submit the $service request$.
Determine a unique tracking number for the $service request$.
Provide the requester with the tracking number for later communication.
Don't wait for risks to be reported, but actively look for threats in vulnerable service sectors, and for improvements in promising sectors.

fields.name: Categorize the risk
fields.description:
Use a $business impact analysis$ (BIA) to determine the $impact$ of a $risk$.
Use $dependency & vulnerability analysis$ to determine the $risk profile$.
Use the $categorization table$.

fields.name: Link the risk
fields.description:
Link the $risk$ to the $service$ and to the $infrastructure$ it relates to.
Link the $risk$ to previously submitted $risks$.

fields.name: Categorize palvelupyyntö
fields.description:
Use the $categorization table$.
Adopt previous workflow details.

fields.name: Submit improvement proposals for the incident handling
fields.description:
Submit a $risk$ for each improvement that resulted from the evaluation.
Register the $risk$ in the $incident call log$.

fields.name: Detail the change plan
fields.description:
Detail the $change plan$ as required.
Include any changes to $continuity plans$.

fields.name: Agree the change plan
fields.description: Agree the $change plan$ with the people involved, and add the $change$ to the $change calendar$.

fields.name: Determine how the effect of the failure can be remedied
fields.description:
Find a previously used solution in the $knowledge base$ (matching) and copy the solution.
If no match is found, search for the solution. If necessary, route the $incident$ to the internal or external $solution team$(s) that should be able to find the solution, until a solution is found.
The solution may be a workaround.

fields.name: Determine the people involved
fields.description:
Determine the $team$s and the people involved, according to the $change category$. Use the $organization chart$ to record the correct titles of the solution teams.
Adopt previous workflow details.

fields.name: Check if palvelupyyntö has been realized
fields.description:
Check whether the $deployment$ actually delivered what was requested.
Check linked $call$s as well.

fields.name: Receive, verify, and register the risk
fields.description:
Verify that the $requester$ is authorized to submit the $service request$.
Determine a unique tracking number for palvelupyyntö.
Provide the requester with the tracking number for later communication.
Don't wait for $risk$s to be reported, but actively look for $threat$s in vulnerable service sectors, and for $improvement$s in promising sectors.

fields.name: Categorize the risk
fields.description:
Use a $business impact analysis$ (BIA) to determine the $impact$ of a $risk$.
Use $dependency & vulnerability analysis$ to determine the $risk profile$.
Use the $categorization table$.

fields.name: Close the incident administratively
fields.description: Set the status of the $incident$ $call$ to 'closed'.

fields.name: Close palvelupyyntö administratively
fields.description: Set the status of the $service request$ $call$ to 'closed'.

fields.name: Plan all operational actions of the services requests on the operations calendar
fields.description:
For new or updated $services$, plan the $activities$ on the relevant static and dynamic $OPS calendar$ section.
For $service request$s from the $customer$, plan the activities on the dynamic $OPS calendar$ section.
Adopt previous workflow details.

fields.name: Close the risk call administratively
fields.description: Set the status of the $risk$ $call$ to 'closed'

fields.name: Evaluate the incident
fields.description:
The $coordinator$s and $operator$s involved evaluate the handling of the $incident$ in various respects:
•	Has the $incident$ call been executed properly?
* Is everything recorded that is important for good reporting?
* Does the handling provide any learning points?
* Is the $call$ a potential standard for the handling of a next $call$?
•	Is an $improvement$ action needed outside the process?

fields.name: Link the incident
fields.description:
Link the $incident$ to the $service$ and to the $infrastructure$ it relates to.
Link the $incident$ to previously submitted $incidents$.	
Adopt previous $workflow$ details.

fields.name: Complete the registration of the risk call
fields.description: Determine what $residual risk$ remains after processing

fields.name: Submit improvement proposals
fields.description:
Submit a $risk$ for each improvement that resulted from the evaluation.
Register the risk in the $change call log$.

fields.name: Run the scheduled tests
fields.description: Run the tests and record the test results in a $test report$.

fields.name: Link palvelupyyntö
fields.description:
Link the $service request$ to the $service$ and to the $infrastructure$ it relates to.
Link the $service request$ to previously submitted $service requests$.
Adopt previous $workflow$ details.

fields.name: Repair the failure via a change and/or a service request
fields.description:
$Change management$ or $operations management$ handles the $service request$, and provides feedback when the recovery is deployed.
In case of an automated $workflow$, trigger the first step of the $CHM$ or $OPS$ process.

fields.name: Complete the registration of the incident call
fields.description: Complete the registration of the $incident$ $call$

fields.name: Draw up the offer for the realization of the wish
fields.description:
Use the format of the $service agreement$ (SA) for the offer.
Draft the required $operational level agreement$s (OLAs) - with the $internal solution team$s - and/or $underpinning contracts$ (UCs, supplier contracts) - with $external solution team$s (suppliers).

fields.name: Repair the failure via a change and/or a service request
fields.description:
$Change management$ or $operations management$ handles the $service request$, and provides feedback when the $recovery$ is deployed.
In case of an automated workflow, trigger the first step of the $CHM$ or $OPS$ process.

fields.name: Verify the deployment of the measure with the requester
fields.description:
Verify that the person who submitted the $risk$ agrees with the result, according to the $service agreement$.
Check linked $call$s as well.
In all workflows (6, 7, and 8), set the status of the call to 'workflow fulfilled'.

fields.name: Verify the incident recovery with the requester
fields.description:
Verify that the person who submitted the $incident$ agrees with the result, according to the $service agreement$.
Check linked calls as well.
In all workflows (3 and 4), set the status of the call to 'workflow fulfilled'.

fields.name: Verify the deployment of palvelupyyntö with the requester
fields.description:
Verify that the person who submitted the $service request$ agrees with the result, according to the $service agreement$.
Check linked calls as well.	
In workflow 5, set the status of the call to 'workflow fulfilled'.
In all other $workflow$s, set the status to 'process fulfilled'.

fields.name: Create business cases for the measures
fields.description: Compare the $measure$s, the $associated result$s, the chances of that result and the costs, and the feasibility, and create a $business case$ for each measure.

fields.name: Submit the trigger for the required workflow
fields.description:
Submit the required $wish$, $request for change$, or $service request$.
In case of an automated workflow, trigger the first step of the $CTM$, $CHM$, or $OPS$ $process$.

fields.name: Determine the cause of the risk
fields.description: Use a $$root cause analysis$$ (RCA) technique to determine the cause of the $risk$.

fields.name: Complete the registration of the risk call
fields.description: Determine what $residual risk$ remains after processing.

fields.name: Categorize the wish
fields.description:
Use the $categorization table$.
Adopt previous $workflow$ details.

fields.name: Evaluate the risk call
fields.description:
The $coordinator$s and $operator$s involved evaluate the handling of the $risk$ in various respects:
•	Has the $call$ been executed properly?
* Is everything recorded that is important for good reporting?
* Does the handling provide any learning points?
* Is the call a potential standard for the handling of a next call?
•	Is an $improvement action$ needed outside the $process$?

fields.name: Specify the individual contributions of the solution teams to the service
fields.description: Specify the contribution of each $solution team$ in terms of $facility$ and $support$, and in terms of $functionality$ and $functioning$.

fields.name: Submit improvement proposals
fields.description:
Submit a $risk$ for each $improvement$ that resulted from the evaluation.
Register the $risk$ in the $wish call log$.

fields.name: Categorize the incident
fields.description: Use the $categorization table$ to categorize the incident

fields.name: Verify the deployment of the measure with the requester
fields.description:
Verify that the person who submitted the $risk$ agrees with the result, according to the $ervice agreement$.
Check linked calls as well.
In all workflows (6, 7, and 8), set the status of the call to 'workflow fulfilled'.

fields.name: Verify that the risk has been handled
fields.description:
Check whether the deployment actually delivered what was requested.
Check linked calls as well.

fields.name: Determine the cause of the risk
fields.description: Use a $root cause analysis$ (RCA) technique to determine the cause of the risk.

fields.name: Evaluate the wish
fields.description:
The $coordinator$s and $operator$s involved evaluate the handling of the wish in various respects:
•	Has the wish call been executed properly?
* Is everything recorded that is important for good reporting?
* Does the handling provide any learning points?
* Is the call a potential standard for the handling of a next call?
•	Is an improvement action needed outside the process?

fields.name: Prepare the change for production
fields.description:
Prepare the requirements for the production environment: manuals, training courses, and tests.
Draw up a [test plan] with a production acceptance test and a user acceptance test.
Draw up a $deployment plan$.

fields.name: Receive, verify, and register palvelupyyntö
fields.description:
Verify that the requester is authorized to submit palvelupyyntö.
Determine a unique tracking number for palvelupyyntö.
Provide the requester with the tracking number for later communication.
Adopt previous workflow details.

fields.name: Identify measures to handle the risk
fields.description:
For negative $risk$s ($threat$s), identify possible measures to limit (mitigate) the effect and/or likelihood of the $risk$.
For positive $risk$s ($opportunities$), identify possible measures to realize the $improvement$.
Determine the $residual risk$.

fields.name: Close the risk call administratively
fields.description: Set the status of the risk call to 'closed'.

fields.name: Verify the deployment of the wish with the requester
fields.description:
Verify that the person who submitted the wish agrees with the result, according to the [Service Agreement].
Check linked calls as well.
In workflow 1, set the status of the call to 'workflow fulfilled'.
In workflow 6, set the status to 'process fulfilled'.

fields.name: Make any reservations
fields.description: Register all proposed contributions in a $reservations register$.

fields.name: Receive, verify, and register the change
fields.description:
Verify that the requester is authorized to submit the change.
Determine a unique tracking number for the change.
Provide the requester with the tracking number for later communication.
Adopt previous workflow details.

fields.name: Verify that the risk has been handled
fields.description:
Check whether the deployment actually delivered what was requested.
Check linked calls as well.

fields.name: Complete the registration of the risk call
fields.description: Determine what $residual risk$ remains after processing.

fields.name: Discuss palvelupyyntö in the context of existing services
fields.description:
Check palvelupyyntö for completeness and discuss palvelupyyntö with the requester to be completely clear about the nature of the call.
Request additional or missing data.

fields.name: Categorize the change
fields.description:
Use the $categorization table$.
Adopt previous workflow details.

fields.name: Prepare the solution
fields.description:
Determine the solution route: through a Change or directly through a Service Request, or a combination of both.
Set up an RFC and/or service request.
In case of a workaround, determine how the workaround is managed: within the call or separately in a linked call.

fields.name: Submit improvement proposals for the risk handling
fields.description:
Submit a risk for each improvement that resulted from the evaluation.
Register the risk in the risk call log.

fields.name: Select the measure
fields.description:
Select the measure with the best [business case].
Prepare the required workflow: create a Wish, a Request for Change, or a Service Request for the deployment of the selected measure.

fields.name: Link the wish
fields.description:
Link the wish to the service and to the infrastructure it relates to.
Link the wish to previously submitted Wishes.
Adopt previous workflow details.

fields.name: Create business cases for the measures
fields.description: Compare the measures, the associated results, the chances of that result and the costs, and the feasibility, and create a [business case] for each measure.

fields.name: Complete the registration of the incident call
Submit an RFC for the realization of the agreed service
fields.description:
Record the RFC number in the wish record or link the change otherwise.
Include the agreed service specification in the RFC, together with all agreed delivery dates from the $reservations register$.
Include the update of all involved MICs, including the updated tasks, authorities, and responsibilities of each involved solution team in the RFC.

fields.name: Qualify and record the solution teams
fields.description:
Qualify all the solution teams as such and record them in the call.
Use the [organization chart] to record the correct titles of the solution teams.
Include involved external solution teams.

fields.name: Complete the registration of the wish
Submit the trigger for the required workflow
fields.description:
Submit the required Wish, Request for Change, or Service Request.
In case of an automated workflow, trigger the first step of the CTM, CHM, or $OP$ process.

fields.name: Complete the registration of the change call
Link the risk
fields.description:
Link the risk to the service and to the infrastructure it relates to.
Link the risk to previously submitted Risks.

fields.name: Categorize the risk
fields.description:
Use $business impact analysis$ (BIA) to determine the $impact$ of a $risk$.
Use a $dependency & vulnerability analysis$ to determine the $risk$ profile.
Use the $categorization table$.

fields.name: Receive, verify, and register the incident
fields.description:
Verify that the $requester$ is authorized to submit the $incident$.
Determine a unique tracking number for the incident.
Provide the $requester$ with the tracking number for later communication. 	
Adopt previous $workflow$ details.

fields.name: Evaluate the risk call
fields.description:
The $coordinator$s and $operator$s involved evaluate the handling of the $risk$ in various respects:
•	Has the $call$ been executed properly?
* Is everything recorded that is important for good reporting?
* Does the handling provide any learning points?
* Is the call a potential standard for the handling of a next call?
•	Is an $improvement action$ needed outside the process?

fields.name: Assemble the contributions into one technical design of the service
fields.description:
Specify the $techical design$ (TD) of the proposed service in one integral composition of the individual contributions of all involved $solution team$s, in terms of $facility$ and $support$, and in terms of $functionality$ and $functioning$.
Include a practical ($SMART$) definition of the 'readiness notification to the requester', which is acceptable to both parties involved.
Use the information that is already available in the $service catalog$.
Calculate the cost of the components and of the whole.

fields.name: Verify the deployment of the measure with the requester
fields.description:
Verify that the person who submitted the risk agrees with the result, according to the [Service Agreement].
Check linked calls as well.
In all workflows (6, 7, and 8), set the status of the call to 'workflow fulfilled'.

fields.name: Close the incident administratively
fields.description: Set the status of the $incident$ call to 'closed'.

fields.name: Select the measure
fields.description:
Select the measure with the best $business case$.
Prepare the required workflow: create a $wish$, a $request for change$, or a $service request$ for the $deployment$ of the selected measure.

fields.name: Prioritize the risk
fields.description:
First, determine the effect according to the $effect table$.
Then, determine the likelihood according to the $likelihood table$.
Assign the resulting priority according to the priority value table: the [risk matrix (heatmap)].

fields.name: Prioritize the wish
fields.description: First, determine the impact according to the $impact table$. Then, determine the urgency according to the $urgency table$. Assign the resulting priority according to the $priority value table$.

fields.name: Prioritize the incident
fields.description: First, determine the impact according to the $impact table$. Then, determine the urgency according to the $urgency table$. Assign the resulting priority according to the $priority value table$.

fields.name: Receive, verify, and register the incident
fields.description:
Verify that the requester is authorized to submit the incident.
Determine a unique tracking number for the incident.
Provide the requester with the tracking number for later communication. 	
Adopt previous workflow details.

fields.name: Discuss the risk in the context of existing services
fields.description:
Check the risk for completeness and discuss the risk with the requester to be completely clear about the nature of the call.
Request additional or missing data.

fields.name: Submit the trigger for the required workflow
fields.description:
Submit the required Wish, Request for Change, or Service Request.
In case of an automated workflow, trigger the first step of the CTM, CHM, or $OPS$ process.

fields.name: Check if recovery of the incident has been realized
fields.description:
Check whether the deployment actually delivered what was requested.
Check linked calls as well.

fields.name: Evaluate palvelupyyntö
fields.description:
The $coordinator$s and $operator$s involved evaluate the handling of palvelupyyntö in various respects:
•	Has the call been executed properly?
* Is everything recorded that is important for good reporting?
* Does the handling provide any learning points?
* Is the call a potential standard for the handling of a next call?
•	Is an improvement action needed outside the process?

fields.name: Prioritize palvelupyyntö
fields.description:
First, determine the impact according to the $impact table$. Then, determine the urgency according to the $urgency table$. Assign the resulting priority according to the $priority value table$.	
Adopt previous workflow details.

fields.name: Check if the change has been realized
fields.description:
Check whether the $deployment$ actually delivered what was requested.
Check linked $call$s as well.

fields.name: Prioritize the risk
fields.description:
First, determine the effect according to the $effect table$.
Then, determine the likelihood according to the $likelihood table$.
Assign the resulting priority according to the priority value table: the [risk matrix (heatmap)].

fields.name: Check if recovery of the incident has been realized
fields.description:
Check whether the $deployment$ actually delivered what was requested.
Check linked $call$s as well.

fields.name: Link the change
fields.description:
Link the $change$ to the $service$ and to the $infrastructure$ it relates to.
Link the change to previously submitted Changes.
Adopt previous workflow details.

fields.name: Submit improvement proposals for the incident handling
fields.description:
Submit a $risk$ for each $improvement$ that resulted from the evaluation.
Register the $risk$ in the $incident call log$.

fields.name: Set the status to 'known error'
fields.description: As soon as the root cause is determined, set the status of the risk to 'known error'.

fields.name: Discuss the change in the context of existing services
fields.description:
Check the $change$ for completeness and discuss the change with the $requester$ to be completely clear about the nature of the $call$.
Request additional or missing data.

fields.name: Link the incident
fields.description:
Link the $incident$ to the $service$ and to the $infrastructure$ it relates to.
Link the $incident$ to previously submitted $incidents$.	
Adopt previous workflow details.

fields.name: Categorize the incident
fields.description: Use the $categorization table$ to categorize the incident.

fields.name: Discuss the risk in the context of existing services
fields.description:
Check the $risk$ for completeness and discuss the $risk$ with the $requester$ to be completely clear about the nature of the $call$.
Request additional or missing data.

fields.name: Prioritize the change
fields.description:
First, determine the $impact$ according to the $impact table$. Then, determine the $urgency$ according to the $urgency table$. Assign the resulting priority according to the $priority value table$.
Adopt previous workflow details.

fields.name: Identify measures to handle the risk
fields.description:
For negative $risk$s ($threat$s), identify possible measures to limit (mitigate) the effect and/or likelihood of the risk.
For positive $risk$s ($opportunities$), identify possible measures to realize the $improvement$.
Determine the $residual risk$.

fields.name: Submit improvement proposals for the risk handling
fields.description:
Submit a risk for each $improvement$ that resulted from the evaluation.
Register the $risk$ in the $risk call log$.

fields.name: Prepare the solution
fields.description:
Determine the solution route: through a $change$ or directly through a $service request$, or a combination of both.
Set up an $request for change$ and/or $service request$.
In case of a workaround, determine how the workaround is managed: within the $call$ or separately in a linked $call$.

fields.name: Discuss the incident in the context of existing services
fields.description:
Check the incident for completeness and discuss the incident with the requester to be completely clear about the nature of the call.
Request additional or missing data.

fields.name: Discuss the offer and adjust it until agreement has been reached with the requester
fields.description:
After reaching an agreement, the service manager converts the offer into a $service agreement$ (SA).
Include any pre-agreed requests (wishes, change requests, incidents, service requests) in the $service agreement$.
Link the $technical design$ to the $service agreement$.
In case there is no agreement reached, all involved solution teams are notified, the $reservations register$ is adjusted, and the call is closed.

fields.name: Determine how the effect of the failure can be remedied
fields.description:
Find a previously used solution in the $knowledge base$ (matching) and copy the solution.
If no match is found, search for the solution. If necessary, route the incident to the internal or external solution team(s) that should be able to find the solution, until a solution is found.
The solution may be a workaround.

fields.name: Identify measures to handle the risk
fields.description:
For negative risks ($threat$s), identify possible measures to limit (mitigate) the effect and/or likelihood of the risk.
For positive risks ($opportunities$), identify possible measures to realize the improvement.
Determine the $residual risk$.

fields.name: Have the prepared changes accepted for production
fields.description:
The involved people assess the $rest report$ and the $deployment plan$.
When the test is accepted, approve the change for deployment in the production environment.

fields.name: Prioritize the risk
fields.description:
First, determine the effect according to the $effect table$.
Then, determine the likelihood according to the $likelihood table$.
Assign the resulting priority according to the priority value table: the $risk matrix$ (heatmap).

fields.name: Check if the wish has been realized
fields.description:
Check whether the deployment actually delivered what was requested.
Check linked calls as well.

fields.name: Set the status to 'known error'
fields.description: As soon as the root cause is determined, set the status of the risk to 'known error'.

fields.name: Receive, verify, and register the wish
fields.description:
Verify that the requester is authorized to submit the wish.
Determine a unique tracking number for the wish.
Provide the requester with the tracking number for later communication.
Adopt previous workflow details.

fields.name: Set the status to 'known error'
fields.description: As soon as the root cause is determined, set the status of the risk to 'known error'.

fields.name: Submit palvelupyyntö to operations for deploying the change
fields.description:
$OPS$ takes the modified infrastructure components into production in a planned manner, according to the included $deployment plan$ and provides feedback when the change is deployed.
In case of an automated workflow, trigger the first step of the $OPS$ process.

fields.name: Close the risk call administratively
fields.description: Set the status of the risk call to 'closed'.

fields.name: Determine the cause of the risk
fields.description: Use a $root cause analysis$ (RCA) technique to determine the cause of the risk.

fields.name: Discuss the risk in the context of existing services
fields.description:
Check the risk for completeness and discuss the risk with the requester to be completely clear about the nature of the call.
Request additional or missing data.

fields.name: Submit improvement proposals for palvelupyyntö handling
fields.description:
Submit a $risk$ for each improvement that resulted from the evaluation.
Register the $risk$ in the $service request call log$.

fields.name: Evaluate the change
fields.description:
The $coordinator$s and $operator$s involved evaluate the handling of the change in various respects:
* Has the change call been executed properly?
* Is everything recorded that is important for good reporting?
* Does the handling provide any learning points?
* Is the call a potential standard for the handling of a next call?
•	Is an $improvement$ action needed outside the process?

fields.name: Draw a service request
fields.description: Draw a $service request$ for the $deployment$ of the tested change, with the associated $deployment plan$.
